attributes.action: Put a stop on hate websites which are spreading and aggravating hate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are growing number of websites which are purely  based on hate for Muslims and insulting our beloved prophet Muhammed [Peace be upon Him].Website showing Prophet Muhammed's Cartoon and insulting comments should not be allowed.This is very dangerous` practice   and it may lead to spread violence and to my worst fears any extremist group can use these hate sites as  an excuse to promote their side of hate and for  recruitment campaigns.  All type of hate promoting and insulting websites should be stoped. No matter what group or religion.
